name: SurvCube
description:
Do you want to shoot red squares? Well, this game is perfect for your fantasies. 

In this game you need to shoot at cyan squares, there's no end only high-score.

Controls

W, A, S, D - moving in every direction

LMB - shoot

V - change camera

TAB - pause game

Installation
  • Download your version of choice
  • Unpack .zip file 
  • Run .exe (for Windows version if you want, you can click on Setup file and create a shortcut on your desktop)
  • Enjoy!

I would be very grateful to hear your opinion of this game.
